description: Baseline run on powerlaw graph (50 nodes), no attacks — контрольная точка.
Small Sybil injection: 10 sybils attacking node N0.
Medium Sybil injection: 30 sybils attacking node N0. Tests resilience to larger sybil groups.
Large Sybil injection: 80 sybils attacking central hub node N0 — stress test.
Contradiction flood: 5 attackers submit contradicting evidence against target N1.
Contradiction flood: 15 attackers against N1 — tests semantic robustness.
Rapid trust drop on a single node (N2) — simulates key compromise or provenance failure.
Combined scenario: medium sybil + contradiction flood + rapid drop in sequence — tests cascades.
Sweep alpha (propagation damping) across [0.6,0.75,0.85,0.95] for baseline graph to measure sensitivity.
